channel.title: Moving Objects?
channel.description:
I am currently making a server and whenever i seem to move objects for people to train or for people to stay within a location it seems to lag my server when more then 2 people are in the area.
Can someone please tell me how to make it so that they are not laggy. I am currently using Chiefscape And 100% editing it.
Also does anyone have the code to make people around me bow like if i walk by them they immediatly start bowing..
Thanks For Your Help
Sincerely, Zlap (Just Here For Fun)
